# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_internal/models/wheel.py
@source-hash: 39d73535558be4df
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:13Z

**Primary Purpose**: Represents a Python wheel file and provides structured access to its filename components for package compatibility checking and tag matching.

**Core Class**: 
- `Wheel (L13-93)`: Main class that parses wheel filenames and provides compatibility checking methods

**Key Attributes** (initialized in `__init__`, L23-43):
- `filename`: Original wheel filename
- `name`: Package name (underscores converted to hyphens)
- `version`: Package version (underscores converted to hyphens)
- `build_tag`: Optional build tag
- `pyversions`: List of Python versions (split on dots)
- `abis`: List of ABI tags (split on dots)
- `plats`: List of platform tags (split on dots)
- `file_tags`: Set of all Tag combinations (Cartesian product of pyversions × abis × plats)

**Core Methods**:
- `__init__(filename) (L23-43)`: Parses wheel filename using regex, extracts components, raises `InvalidWheelFilename` if invalid
- `get_formatted_file_tags() (L45-47)`: Returns sorted string list of all tags
- `support_index_min(tags) (L49-65)`: Finds lowest index of wheel's tags in supported tags list, raises `ValueError` if no match
- `find_most_preferred_tag(tags, tag_to_priority) (L67-86)`: Returns minimum priority of matching tags using priority mapping, optimized alternative to linear scan
- `supported(tags) (L88-93)`: Boolean check if wheel is compatible with any given tags using set intersection

**Key Dependencies**:
- `pip._vendor.packaging.tags.Tag`: For PEP 425 tag representation
- `pip._internal.exceptions.InvalidWheelFilename`: For filename validation errors

**Regex Pattern** (L16-21): Complex verbose regex matching PEP 427 wheel filename format: `{name}-{version}(-{build tag})?-{python tag}-{abi tag}-{platform tag}.whl`

**Architecture Notes**:
- Uses Cartesian product approach for tag generation (all combinations of Python/ABI/platform tags)
- Normalizes underscores to hyphens following wheel naming conventions
- Optimizes tag matching with both linear scan and priority mapping approaches
- Leverages set operations for efficient compatibility checking
